title: wanted to change my summoner name but wont let me becasue of a N
body: I wanted to change my name from nexes to Nexes I know its not a big change but I was wondering why I couldn't change if I have the original name without the capital N seems very minuscule  and everyone knows having capitals in names are {{summoner:4}}

replies.body:
Summoner Names are treated without capitalisation, but they are still displayed, so when you go to change from nexes to Nexes, it thinks you're not changing the name at all.

Hope that helps.
So does that mean I have to change whole summoner name because I cant get it with capital?
Well, it seems that way. Have you tried sending in a support ticket to Riot about this?
